item.title: Debo Dutta joins PPMC
item.description:
I am very pleased to announce that the Podling Project Management Committee (PPMC) of Apache Metron has asked Debo Dutta to become an Apache Metron committer, and he has already accepted.

Debo has already made many contributions to Metron community, working on getting a software grant from Cisco and creating a first version of the Metron website.

Please join me to welcome Debo.

item.title: Metron adopts new logo
item.description: The Metron project has adopted a new logo. We hope you like it.

item.title: Metron accepted into Apache Incubator
item.description: Congratulations! Metron accepted into the Apache Incubator.
